DataElement.preferredName: Ipsilateral Breast Localized Within Field Recurrence Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to the same side breast spread to a local region defined as within.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Ipsilateral Breast Localized Within Field Recurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the same side breast spread to a local region defined as within.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Having to do with the same side of the body.:One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.

Concepts.definition: Having to do with the same side of the body.
One of two hemispheric projections of variable size situated in the subcutaneous layer over the pectoralis major muscle on either side of the chest.

Property.preferredDefinition: Restricted to the site of origin, without evidence of spread.:On the inside; contained in.:The region in which a particular type of force can be observed, often viewed as a space which was modified by the sources of the force which the field represents.:To occur again.

Concepts.definition: Restricted to the site of origin, without evidence of spread.
The region in which a particular type of force can be observed, often viewed as a space which was modified by the sources of the force which the field represents.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
